node.sharedMemory

Class MPSM

  • java.lang.Object
    • node.sharedMemory.MPSM

  • public class MPSM
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all malicious IP patterns and malicious String patterns. Fully synchronized, no need for manual synchronization.
    Author:
    Parisbre56

    • Constructor Detail

      • MPSM

        public MPSM()
        Contains the malicious IPs and string patterns. Removing a malicious string or IP also removes the statistics for it

    • Method Detail

      • addString

        public void addString(java.lang.String data)
        Parameters:
        data - The malicious string pattern to add to memory. If it already exists, it just sets it as active.

      • removeString

        public void removeString(java.lang.String data)
        Sets it as inactive. Does not actually delete it so that they can be used for statistics
        Parameters:
        data - The string to mark as inactive

      • addIP

        public void addIP(java.lang.String data)
        Parameters:
        data - The ip to mark as active.

      • removeIP

        public void removeIP(java.lang.String data)
        Sets it as inactive. Does not actually delete it so that they can be used for statistics
        Parameters:
        data - The IP to set as inactive.

      • setAllInactive

        public void setAllInactive()
        Sets all as inactive. Does not actually delete them so that they can be used for statistics

      • containsIP

        public java.lang.Boolean containsIP(java.net.InetAddress addrSource)
        Parameters:
        addrSource - The address to search for
        Returns:
        True if the memory contains the address, else false.

      • getMatchingStringCollection

        public java.util.LinkedList<StringPatternDetectionEvents> getMatchingStringCollection(java.lang.String string)
        Checks all patterns and returns a collection of all regular expression patterns that had a match in the provided string
        Parameters:
        string - The string containing the data that will be checked for matches
        Returns:
        a collection of all regular expression patterns that had at least one match in the provided string.

      • getMatchingIP

        public StringPattern getMatchingIP(java.net.InetAddress addrSource)
        Parameters:
        addrSource - The IP pattern to search for
        Returns:
        The malicious IP pattern matching this address, else null
